question: I would like to know whether it is allowed for men to cut hair from following positions...
answer:
QUESTION

1) I would like to know whether it is allowed for men to cut hair from following positions:

i) Legs ii)Thighs iii) Chest

2) Similarly, I would like to know whether it is allowed for women to cut hair from following positions:

i) Legs ii)Thighs iii) Chest

 

ANSWER


Share:

In the name of Allah, Most Gracious, Most Merciful

Assalaamu `alaykum waRahmatullahi Wabarakatoh

It is permissible for both, men and women to remove their hair from the legs, thighs, and chest, but it is undesirable for them to do so.

Bahishti Zewar p. 951 Maktaba Thanwi Deoband
Rad al-Muhtar (6/407) H.M. Saeed Company

وفى حلق الصدر والظهر ترك الادب (رد المحتار)

And Allah knows best

Wassalam

Ml. Ehzaz Ajmeri,
